items.sentence: How long has it been since you've gone swimming, Tom?
It's about three kilometers from here to the station.
We can't pass up this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
We have to persuade Tom that he should take that job.
You should've asked for permission before doing that.
Do you really think that that's absolutely necessary?
Tom said that he would never play with magnets again.
Tom turned on the slow cooker before going to school.
Tom realized that he had developed feelings for Mary.
That was the first time that I ever tried doing that.
